# GRAPHICS::HAS_SCALEFORM_CONTAINER_MOVIE_LOADED_INTO_PARENT

## Summary
Returns true if the child is loaded, false if its not or it doesnt have a child

## Parameters
* **SCALEFORM_INDEX** scaleformMovieId: Parent movie id

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
returns TRUE if this movie has got a child and its loaded
